actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Works and Economic Development Act to provide economic development assistance to regions suffering from increases in energy-related employment.
short_title: Energy Related Economic Development Act of 1979

summary.text: Energy-Related Economic Development Act of 1979 - Amends the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965 to provide grants for the costs of economic development planning activities in regions suffering economic dislocation as a result of energy-related employment. Authorizes appropriations not to exceed $150,000,000 for fiscal year 1980 and for each of the three succeeding fiscal years to carry out this Act.

titles.title: Energy Related Economic Development Act of 1979
A bill to amend the Public Works and Economic Development Act to provide economic development assistance to regions suffering from increases in energy-related employment.
